name: Promotion Class: Vanguard Scout
description:
Role: Melee Damage

Known for lurking in the shadows and leaving only to finish off a wounded target.

Stat Adjustments:
Health +750
Stealth +15
Stealth Damage +30%

Traits Granted:
Pistol Mastery
Rapier Mastery

Enhancements:
Pepperbox Shot: Now inflicts Stun on 5 pips spent.
Keen Guard: Now has a chance to slow enemies that hit you while active
Flintlock Shot: Now increases movement speed for a duration when used.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Vanguard Scout  promotion class and prevents access to the Slayer and Dirge  promotion classes.
